page.title: 13A LOCAL LIBRARY,CUMBERNAULD.
page.content: Our local Library is in Condorrat Village.It is only a few years old and inside it is very modern.However the outside of the building has been made to fit in with the other houses in the village.To do this the architect has used slates instead of roof tiles,he has put dormer windows on the roof although there is no upstairs and the walls have pebble_dash on them.The library is spacious inside and has room for many books .When my class did a project on the library we found out that{it had 80 bookshelves,}each bookshelf had{5 shelves}and this gave{ {352 metres of shelf space.}Condorrat library has both a children's and adult's section and the non_fiction books are classified using the{Dewey {Decimal Classification System. }
